column4: How do I get my desktop resolution to 1600X1200? I've added that to my XF86Config-4 file, restarted gnome.  Have I missed anything?
the first resolution listed in the XF file for the color depth you are using is the one that comes up by default.
you can always do Ctrl+Alt+ (+ or -) to change the resolution too.
I've tried that - is there a way to see what resolution and color depth I'm running at from the command line?
